sqlMap.select: select A.board_id, A.board_title, A.board_content, A.board_name, a.board_create_date, B.department_name, C.employee_name from ( select free_board_id board_id, free_board_title board_title, free_board_content board_content, free_board_name board_name, to_char(free_board_create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') board_create_date, department_id, employee_id from ( select * from free_board free union select * from notice_board notice ) ) A, department B, employee C where a.department_id = b.department_id and a.employee_id = c.employee_id order by board_create_date desc
select sum(C.cnt) from ( select count(*) cnt from free_board union all select count(*) cnt from notice_board ) C

select A.board_id, A.board_title, A.board_content, B.department_name, C.employee_name, to_char(A.board_create_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') board_create_date, A.board_name from board A, department B, employee C where A.department_id = B.department_id and A.employee_id = C.employee_id and A.board_id = #board_id#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_ID , BOARD_TITLE , DEPARTMENT_ID , BOARD_CREATE_DATE , BOARD_NAME , EMPLOYEE_ID , BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( board_seq.nextval, #board_title#, #department_id#, TO_DATE(sysdate), '자유', #employee_id#, #board_content#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE=#board_title# , BOARD_CONTENT=#board_content# WHERE BOARD_ID=#board_id#
